metadata.title: Matheus N. Andrade // FullStack Developer
metadata.description: FullStack Developer | NextJS | React | TypeScript | JavaScript | PHP

about.heading: Who am I?
about.paragraph: Self-taught developer, 30 years old, I started coding at fourteen just for fun, and I ended up falling in love with the profession. Focused on web application development, I am currently seeking new challenges in creating applications, websites, and digital products.

frontend.paragraph: Always aiming for clean and pleasant visuals, maintaining cohesion with the visual identity.

backend.paragraph: My primary server-side concern is data security while maintaining optimization for the best UX.

portfolio.heading: Made it myself
portfolio.paragraph: Check this great projects that I build it myself, and are in production!

descriptions.streamar: Crowdfunding platform focused on content creators and influencers in the live streaming space.
descriptions.abn: In addition to the company's website, I developed a customized business management system specifically tailored to its needs.
descriptions.aleta: I work together with the agency to serve its clients, providing labor for website creation and server maintenance.
descriptions.italifood: At the request of a restaurant (NDA), I created a web application focused on receiving online orders from its customers.
